level.text: In addition to the judges and referee, the Commission shall designate two (2) minimum kick requirement officials, one assigned to each contestant.
The minimum kick requirement official assigned to a contest shall sit in the corner opposite to that contestant.
The minimum kick requirement official shall determine the contestant’s compliance with § 2316.
A minimum kick requirement official shall use a kick counter ballot to enter the number of kicks executed by the official’s assigned contestant during each round.
If a contestant executes less than the minimum required kicks in any round, the official shall notify the referee of the number of kicks executed.
The referee shall notify the scorekeeper, who shall record the appropriate penalty.
Upon failure of any contestant to meet the minimum kick requirements for a round, the assessed penalty and any consequences shall be announced to the public before the beginning of the next round.
